record.id: field.name="valid.type" and file.name="timeperiodRule" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: valid.type
record.file.name: timeperiodRule

brief.brief: The type of the expiration. The following options are possible.
- Expires at -> Service Manager creates occurrences only for dates no later than the specified date.
- Expires after -> Service Manager creates only the specified number of occurrences for the rule.

- Never expires -> This rule never expires. Service Manager creates occurrences in advance up to the maximum allowed number configured in the Time Period Settings, and checks subsequent occurrences daily.
